verses.text: In the \w third|strong="H7969"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of the \w reign|strong="H4438"\w* of \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Belshazzar|strong="H1112"\w* a \w vision|strong="H2377"\w* \w appeared|strong="H7200"\w* unto me, \add even unto\add* me \w Daniel|strong="H1840"\w*, \w after|strong="H0310"\w* that which \w appeared|strong="H7200"\w* unto me at the \w first|strong="H8462"\w*.

And I \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* in a \w vision|strong="H2377"\w*; and it came to pass, when I \w saw|strong="H7200"\w*, that I \add was\add* at \w Shushan|strong="H7800"\w* \add in\add* the \w palace|strong="H1002"\w*, which \add is\add* in the \w province|strong="H4082"\w* of \w Elam|strong="H5867"\w*; and I \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* in a \w vision|strong="H2377"\w*, and I was by the \w river|strong="H0180"\w* of \w Ulai|strong="H0195"\w*.

Then I lifted \w up|strong="H5375"\w* mine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, and \w saw|strong="H7200"\w*, and, behold, there \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w river|strong="H0180"\w* \w a|strong="H0259"\w* \w ram|strong="H0352"\w* which had \add two\add* \w horns|strong="H7161"\w*: and the \add two\add* \w horns|strong="H7161"\w* \add were\add* \w high|strong="H1364"\w*; but \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \add was\add* \w higher|strong="H1364"\w* than the \w other|strong="H8145"\w*, and the \w higher|strong="H1364"\w* came \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w last|strong="H0314"\w*.\f + \fr 8.3 \ft the other: Heb. the second\f*

I \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* the \w ram|strong="H0352"\w* \w pushing|strong="H5055"\w* \w westward|strong="H3220"\w*, and \w northward|strong="H6828"\w*, and \w southward|strong="H5045"\w*; so that no \w beasts|strong="H2416"\w* might \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* him, neither \add was there any\add* that could \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* out of his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*; but he \w did|strong="H6213"\w* according to his \w will|strong="H7522"\w*, and became \w great|strong="H1431"\w*.

And as I was \w considering|strong="H0995"\w*, behold, an \w he|strong="H5795"\w* \w goat|strong="H6842"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* from the \w west|strong="H4628"\w* on the \w face|strong="H6440"\w* of the whole \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, and \w touched|strong="H5060"\w* not the \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*: and the \w goat|strong="H6842"\w* \add had\add* a \w notable|strong="H2380"\w* \w horn|strong="H7161"\w* between his \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*.\f + \fr 8.5 \ft touched…: or, none touched him in the earth\f*\f + \fr 8.5 \ft a notable…: Heb. a horn of sight\f*

And he \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to the \w ram|strong="H0352"\w* that \w had|strong="H1167"\w* \add two\add* \w horns|strong="H7161"\w*, which I had \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w standing|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w river|strong="H0180"\w*, and \w ran|strong="H7323"\w* unto him in the \w fury|strong="H2534"\w* of his \w power|strong="H3581"\w*.

And I \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* him \w come|strong="H5060"\w* close \w unto|strong="H0681"\w* the \w ram|strong="H0352"\w*, and he was moved with \w choler|strong="H4843"\w* against him, and \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* the \w ram|strong="H0352"\w*, and \w brake|strong="H7665"\w* his \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w horns|strong="H7161"\w*: and there was no \w power|strong="H3581"\w* in the \w ram|strong="H0352"\w* to \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* him, but he cast him \w down|strong="H7993"\w* to the \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*, and \w stamped|strong="H7429"\w* upon him: and there was none that could \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* the \w ram|strong="H0352"\w* out of his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

Therefore the \w he|strong="H6842"\w* \w goat|strong="H5795"\w* waxed \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w great|strong="H1431"\w*: and when he was \w strong|strong="H6105"\w*, the \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w horn|strong="H7161"\w* was \w broken|strong="H7665"\w*; and for it came \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w four|strong="H0702"\w* notable \w ones|strong="H2380"\w* toward the \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w winds|strong="H7307"\w* of \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*.

And out of \w one|strong="H0259"\w* of them came \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* a \w little|strong="H4704"\w* \w horn|strong="H7161"\w*, which waxed \w exceeding|strong="H3499"\w* \w great|strong="H1431"\w*, toward the \w south|strong="H5045"\w*, and toward the \w east|strong="H4217"\w*, and toward the \w pleasant|strong="H6643"\w* \add land\add*.

And it waxed \w great|strong="H1431"\w*, \add even\add* to the \w host|strong="H6635"\w* of \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*; and it cast \w down|strong="H5307"\w* \add some\add* of the \w host|strong="H6635"\w* and of the \w stars|strong="H3556"\w* to the \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*, and \w stamped|strong="H7429"\w* upon them.\f + \fr 8.10 \ft to the host: or, against the host\f*

Yea, he \w magnified|strong="H1431"\w* \add himself\add* even to the \w prince|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w host|strong="H6635"\w*, and by him the \w daily|strong="H8548"\w* \add sacrifice\add* was taken \w away|strong="H7311"\w*, and the \w place|strong="H4349"\w* of his \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w* was cast \w down|strong="H7993"\w*.\f + \fr 8.11 \ft to: or, against\f*\f + \fr 8.11 \ft by him: or, from him\f*

And an \w host|strong="H6635"\w* was \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \add him\add* against the \w daily|strong="H8548"\w* \add sacrifice\add* by reason of \w transgression|strong="H6588"\w*, and it cast \w down|strong="H7993"\w* the \w truth|strong="H0571"\w* to the \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*; and it \w practised|strong="H6213"\w*, and \w prospered|strong="H6743"\w*.\f + \fr 8.12 \ft an host…: or, the host was given over for the transgression against the daily sacrifice\f*

¶ Then I \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w saint|strong="H6918"\w* \w speaking|strong="H1696"\w*, and \w another|strong="H0259"\w* \w saint|strong="H6918"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto that \w certain|strong="H6422"\w* \add saint\add* which \w spake|strong="H1696"\w*, How long \add shall be\add* the \w vision|strong="H2377"\w* \add concerning\add* the \w daily|strong="H8548"\w* \add sacrifice\add*, and the \w transgression|strong="H6588"\w* of \w desolation|strong="H8074"\w*, to \w give|strong="H5414"\w* both the \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w* and the \w host|strong="H6635"\w* to be trodden under \w foot|strong="H4823"\w*?\f + \fr 8.13 \ft that…: or, the numberer of secrets, or, the wonderful numberer: Heb. Palmoni\f*\f + \fr 8.13 \ft of…: or, making desolate\f*

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, Unto two \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w days|strong="H6153"\w*; then shall the \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w* be \w cleansed|strong="H6663"\w*.\f + \fr 8.14 \ft days: Heb. evening morning\f*\f + \fr 8.14 \ft cleansed: Heb. justified\f*

¶ And it came to pass, when I, \add even\add* I \w Daniel|strong="H1840"\w*, had \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* the \w vision|strong="H2377"\w*, and \w sought|strong="H1245"\w* for the \w meaning|strong="H0998"\w*, then, behold, there \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* before me as the \w appearance|strong="H4758"\w* of a \w man|strong="H1397"\w*.

And I \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* a \w man’s|strong="H0120"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* between \add the banks of\add* \w Ulai|strong="H0195"\w*, which \w called|strong="H7121"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Gabriel|strong="H1403"\w*, make \w this|strong="H1975"\w* \add man\add* to \w understand|strong="H0995"\w* the \w vision|strong="H4758"\w*.

So he \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w near|strong="H0681"\w* where I \w stood|strong="H5977"\w*: and when he \w came|strong="H0935"\w*, I was \w afraid|strong="H1204"\w*, and \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* upon my \w face|strong="H6440"\w*: but he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, \w Understand|strong="H0995"\w*, O \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*: for at the \w time|strong="H6256"\w* of the \w end|strong="H7093"\w* \add shall be\add* the \w vision|strong="H2377"\w*.

Now as he was \w speaking|strong="H1696"\w* with me, I was in a deep \w sleep|strong="H7290"\w* on my \w face|strong="H6440"\w* toward the \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*: but he \w touched|strong="H5060"\w* me, and \w set|strong="H5975"\w* me \w upright|strong="H5977"\w*.\f + \fr 8.18 \ft set…: Heb. made me stand upon my standing\f*

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Behold, I will make thee \w know|strong="H3045"\w* what shall be in the last \w end|strong="H0319"\w* of the \w indignation|strong="H2195"\w*: for at the time \w appointed|strong="H4150"\w* the \w end|strong="H7093"\w* \add shall be\add*.

The \w ram|strong="H0352"\w* which thou \w sawest|strong="H7200"\w* \w having|strong="H1167"\w* \add two\add* \w horns|strong="H7161"\w* \add are\add* the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Media|strong="H4074"\w* and \w Persia|strong="H6539"\w*.

And the \w rough|strong="H8163"\w* \w goat|strong="H6842"\w* \add is\add* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Grecia|strong="H3120"\w*: and the \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w horn|strong="H7161"\w* that \add is\add* between his \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \add is\add* the \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

Now that being \w broken|strong="H7665"\w*, whereas \w four|strong="H0702"\w* stood \w up|strong="H5975"\w* for it, \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w kingdoms|strong="H4438"\w* shall stand \w up|strong="H5975"\w* out of the \w nation|strong="H1471"\w*, but not in his \w power|strong="H3581"\w*.

And in the latter \w time|strong="H0319"\w* of their \w kingdom|strong="H4438"\w*, when the \w transgressors|strong="H6586"\w* are come to the \w full|strong="H8552"\w*, a \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w fierce|strong="H5794"\w* \w countenance|strong="H6440"\w*, and \w understanding|strong="H0995"\w* dark \w sentences|strong="H2420"\w*, shall stand \w up|strong="H5975"\w*.\f + \fr 8.23 \ft are…: Heb. are accomplished\f*

And his \w power|strong="H3581"\w* shall be \w mighty|strong="H6105"\w*, but not by his own \w power|strong="H3581"\w*: and he shall \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w* \w wonderfully|strong="H6381"\w*, and shall \w prosper|strong="H6743"\w*, and \w practise|strong="H6213"\w*, and shall \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w* the \w mighty|strong="H6099"\w* and the \w holy|strong="H6918"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.\f + \fr 8.24 \ft holy…: Heb. people of the holy ones\f*

And through his \w policy|strong="H7922"\w* also he shall cause \w craft|strong="H4820"\w* to \w prosper|strong="H6743"\w* in his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*; and he shall \w magnify|strong="H1431"\w* \add himself\add* in his \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*, and by \w peace|strong="H7962"\w* shall \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w*: he shall also stand \w up|strong="H5975"\w* against the \w Prince|strong="H8269"\w* of \w princes|strong="H8269"\w*; but he shall be \w broken|strong="H7665"\w* \w without|strong="H0657"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.\f + \fr 8.25 \ft peace: or, prosperity\f*

And the \w vision|strong="H4758"\w* of the \w evening|strong="H6153"\w* and the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* which was \w told|strong="H0559"\w* \add is\add* \w true|strong="H0571"\w*: wherefore shut thou \w up|strong="H5640"\w* the \w vision|strong="H2377"\w*; for it \add shall be\add* for \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.

And I \w Daniel|strong="H1840"\w* \w fainted|strong="H1961"\w*, and was \w sick|strong="H2470"\w* \add certain\add* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*; afterward I rose \w up|strong="H6965"\w*, and \w did|strong="H6213"\w* the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w business|strong="H4399"\w*; and I was \w astonished|strong="H8074"\w* at the \w vision|strong="H4758"\w*, but none \w understood|strong="H0995"\w* \add it\add*.
